title: Ticket #2995: "condor_qedit -h" doesn't work if qedit can't determine the address
description:
"condor_qedit -h" will bomb out without displaying a help message if a schedd address isn't configured.

See: 

~> condor_qedit -h
condor_qedit: ERROR: Can't find address of local schedd

Of course, I would tell condor_qedit how to find the schedd if "-h" would tell me what command line options to use.

This was done against 7.9.0 trunk.
remarks:
2014-Jul-25 16:10:26 by jfrey:
It's worse in Condor 8.3. condor_qedit -h now results in a core dump.
